interesting_fact: Koalas sleep up to 22 hours a day
Octopuses have three hearts and blue blood
Elephants can recognize themselves in mirrors
Emperor penguins can dive up to 565 meters deep
Foxes use the Earth's magnetic field to hunt
Sloths move so slowly that algae can grow on their fur
Platypuses are venomous mammals that lay eggs
Giraffes have the same number of neck vertebrae as humans
Axolotls can regenerate lost body parts including parts of their brain
